name: createNostrMarkdownExtensions
title: Nostr Markdown Extensions
oneLiner: Marked.js extensions for rendering Nostr-specific content like mentions, event references, custom emojis, and hashtags
description: A collection of Marked.js extensions that add Nostr protocol awareness to markdown rendering. These extensions parse and tokenize Nostr-specific patterns including: - **Mentions** (nostr:npub..., nostr:nprofile...) - Renders user mentions as linkable elements - **Event References** (nostr:note..., nostr:nevent..., nostr:naddr...) - Renders event links and embeds - **Custom Emojis** (:shortcode: with NIP-30 emoji tags) - Renders custom emoji images - **Hashtags** (#topic) - Renders hashtags as linkable topics Each extension returns placeholder HTML with data attributes that your components can hydrate. For example, mentions render as `` which your User component can then replace with rich user cards. These extensions integrate seamlessly with the marked library and work with the MarkdownEventContent component.
